tags: [component, tooltip]

# ti-widget-tooltip

 `ti-widget-tooltip` is a tooltip with bindable properties.  
 It provides a tooltip for any content in it's slot, or to another component that it is anchored to.
 
  Example:
 
  ```html
	   <ti-widget-tooltip id="demo-element-c" text="tooltip for the text in the slot">Some text</ti-widget-tooltip>
  ```	   
 
  See [demo](demo/index.html) for a full working example of how to use this component.
